creator: tbernert@c1-fse.de
text:
There are some bugs around the file handling of 'put' and 'get' mathod. All 
bugs fixed.The new implementation of file handling works like a 'DOS-COPY'-
command.

creator: tbernert@c1-fse.de
text:
Created attachment 11331
Method GET: If the http status of GET isn't ok, the client creates a new target file. Now we check at first the status of GET. Is any type of OK the target file will be created. For speedup the size of buffer was increased.

Created attachment 11332
The filehandling of GET and PUT were adapted to the file handling of DOS.
creator: tbernert@c1-fse.de
